teaser_1.title: SF Chinatown - Welcome
teaser_1.description: Welcome to San Francisco's historic Chinatown district

thumbnails.title: Historic Chinatown Gateway
thumbnails.description: The iconic Dragon Gate entrance to San Francisco's Chinatown, built in 1970 as a symbol of friendship between the sister cities.

thumbnails.title: Traditional Architecture
thumbnails.description: Victorian buildings adapted with Chinese architectural elements, showcasing the unique cultural blend of the neighborhood.

thumbnails.title: Grant Avenue
thumbnails.description: The bustling main thoroughfare of Chinatown, lined with shops, restaurants, and cultural landmarks dating back to the 1800s.

teaser_2.title: SF Chinatown - Cultural Heritage
teaser_2.description: Discover the rich cultural traditions of Chinatown

teaser_3.title: SF Chinatown - Hidden Gems
teaser_3.description: Explore the lesser-known corners of Chinatown

teaser_4.title: SF Chinatown - Modern Life
teaser_4.description: Experience contemporary life in historic Chinatown
